item.text: Welcome to this [[Federated Wiki]] site. From this page you can find who we are and what we do. New sites provide this information and then claim the site as their own. You will need your own site to participate.
Pages about us.

item.prompt:
Link to a page about yourself here. Type your name enclosed in double square brackets. Then press Command/ALT-S to save.

Make all pages here yours alone with the login below.

item.text: Pages where we do and share.

item.prompt: Create pages about things you do on this wiki. Type a descriptive name of something you will be writing about. Enclose it in square brackets. Then press Command/ALT-S to save.

item.text: You can edit your copy of these pages. Press [+] to add more writing spaces. Read [[How to Wiki]] for more ideas. Follow [[Recent Changes]] here and nearby.

item.text: My name is David Bovill, and I'm excited to be part of this second Happening. My nickname (and handle on twitter) is [https://twitter.com/fortyfoxes @fortyfoxes]. This unfortunate name stuck (it comes from a Turkish saying), as not many other people used it as a user name. At the time I also favoured the anonymity it offered.
item.title: David Bovill

item.text: [[SciTopia]] is a science project (originally proposed to the Welcome Trust in 2012), that looks to create a new form of [[Scientific Institution]], based on a  analysis of the activities and practice of real world science.
item.title: SciTopia

item.text: Here are some pages that I am [[Currently Working On]]
Here are some pages that I am [[Currently Working On]] and this is my [[Project Template]]

To celebrate the 500 year anniversary of the publication of Utopia, and to accompany the exhibition of the original manuscripts by the Museum of Leuven, we are seeking to curate the publication of a series of live online performances, to take part in the three dimensional world of Minecraft.
item.title: Building Utopia

item.text: [[Decentralised Academy]]
<H3>Neighbourhoods
<H3>Neighbourhoods
A list of sites I own and write on. See [[Recent Changes]] for a list of all the things I've been writing.
item.title: My Neighbourhood

item.text: The decentralised academy is a p2p learning project that is layered on top of a decentralised, distributed and federated technical and legal architecture.
item.title: Decentralised Academy

item.text: <H3>Previous Projects
On this site I list existing and previous projects I have worked on and invite other people to partner me on. Follow [[Recent Changes]] here and nearby.
On this site I list existing and previous projects I have worked on and invite other people to partner me on. Follow [[Recent Changes]] to see what I am [[Currently Working On]].
Culture Kit is a participative, decentralised platform for engaging a wide range of stakeholders, based around pop-up learning experiences constructed out of new ways of sharing [[Free Culture]].
item.title: Culture Kit

item.text: On this site I list existing and previous projects I have worked on and invite other people to [[Form Storm]] with me. Follow [[Recent Changes]] to see what I am [[Currently Working On]].
Form Storming is a process of writing forms together - it's like brain storming but for forms.
item.title: Form Storm

story.text: On this site I list existing and previous projects I have worked on and invite other people to [[Form Storm]] with me. Follow [[Recent Changes]] to see what I am [[Currently Working On]].
Form Storming is a process of writing forms together - it's like brain storming but for forms.
story.title: Form Storm
